fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • A review of the panto Cinderella at the Lyric Hammersmith, London, said the show ended tonight. In fact it runs until 5 January (5 December, page 13, G2). • Princess Anne is not the only person in her immediate family to win BBC Sports Personality of the Year. Her daughter, Zara Phillips, won the award in 2006 (Pass notes, 5 December, page 2, G2). • Other recently corrected articles include: The treatment of antisemitism in our politics should fill us with despair Tackling degraded oceans could mitigate climate crisis – report Samoa measles outbreak: WHO blames anti-vaccine scare as death toll hits 39 Basquiat and Haring: unprecedented art show revives the ‘manic draughtsmen’ of 80s New York
